metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7435 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FreeXL before 1.0.5. There is a heap-basedbuffer over-read in the freexl::destroy_cell function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreexl1 - 1.0.0g-1ubuntu0.14.04.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freexl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0g-1ubuntu0.14.04.3').
